title: Silver 4. Mid/Support (my old main, only like playing if duo with ADC)
body:
Looking for a silver 4/3 player to duo with to climb easier with, i mainly play Annie or Xerath depending on first pick mid etc.
Summoner: RockieRover

replies.body:
Hey

I am trying to get a bit of a team/community together for improving together.

https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/kaB0hk15-lets-make-an-improvement-focused-flex-teamcommunity-bronze-silver-gold
